subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: It can get pretty strange.
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1208966756
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Frank,
 
Thank you for your input.  I have already informed Bruce that all his  emails 
have been given to the local police department via the local beat cop  here 
who is a really nice guy.  The next step which I will do today is to  contact 
the local police department where he lives and provide them with all the  
emails and his threats. Which shall be done later today.  I shall see if  they can 
talk some sense into him but if not then the FBI will be the next  step.
 
Thank you for your advise.
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 4/22/2008 11:54:06 P.M. Central Daylight Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 
 
I don't know what to do about it--oh yeah, see below! I've had  
arguements in the past and almost got fired cuz the other person  
forwarded all my responses to my boss, who happened to be my e-mail  
provider. I don't want to go there again. 

I have to ask, or wish I  could ask, if these people are possessed 
before, or after box use? I  suspect it's before, I hope it's before, 
or I have some serious karma to  deal with. 

It is a federal crime to threaten and intimidate using  e-mail and 
the internet, and the FBI does have an on-line reporting  center. It's 
title 18 something. 

Frank-S

--- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,  
Marlboro63@.,  Mar
>
> Hi Frank,
> 
> I know  this is all stupid and some of us have really had enough of 
it. 
>  Especially being called childish names and being swore at and 
threatened.  But it 
> hasn't stopped in private emails?
> 
> This is  such the case. And now it has come down to physical 
threats because  
> well maybe that's all these neanderthals know or can understand.  
ANd yes it 
> has been reported to the proper authorities but what  do you 
recommend be 
> done about iy.
> 
> Your opinion  would be greatly appreiated.
> 
> Jeff
> 
> 
>  In a message dated 4/22/2008 4:56:05 P.M. Central Daylight Time, 
>  purplealiengirl@  purple
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  Huh!? I can only say, I don't have to do this group thing either, 
I  
> stay cuz a few request it. The guys actually talk more if I don't  
> share. 
> 
> I can understand where Bruce was coming fom,  to a point, but when 
> you start making threatening private e-mails to  make sure everyone 
> agrees with you, that's just demented and wrong.  This shit ain't 
> that important!
> 
> FS
> 
>  --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroup  --- In _EVP-IT
_ITC@..._ (mailto:ITC@yahoogroups.com) ) , 
>  psfponies <psfponies@.ps> wrote:
> >
> >  Interesting message Frank considering the events that have 
> unfolded  over the last couple of days. Kind of like shooting 
oneself 
> in  the foot!
> > 
> > Kay
> > 
> >

>  www.pyracantha.  www.pyracan 
> > 
> > Also "  
> > The Archangel Gabriel Archangel of the West and of Water,  
Gabriel 
> is the Messenger of God. And is well known for his  announcement of 
> the birth of Jesus.
> > He is connected with  our emotions, cleansing, loving and 
intuitive 
> self. And can aid  you with your spiritual insight, growth and 
> travels on the astral  planes.
> > Also connected with the Moon, and the sea and all life  that is 
> within.If you are working with dolphins, he is your  contact.
> > Present at our births he occasionally turns up at our  final 
> transition to ease us through. "
> > 
> >  From sanctuary-of- From sanc From sanc Fro
> > 
> > 
>  > 
> > A weird Gabriel reference, and a Bruce comment. From a  recording 
> done Sunday night. 
> > 
> >  Frank-S
